original: Kugelberg, Erik Gustaf, major, Linköping, f. 9/3/91 i Malexander, Öster-götl. 1., av kapt. Oscar K. o. Ellen Hagberg. G. 16 m. Gunnel Arre. Barn: Ingrid f. 17, Hans 19, löjtn. i I. 4 res. — Stud:ex. i Norrköp. 11, off :ex. 13, SS, vapenoff :kurs. Und:-döjtn. v. Första livgren :reg. 13, löjtn. 17, v. Livgren :reg. 28, kapt. där s. å., major 40. RSO, SvmifbGM, Svgifrfb- GM, öistergötl. 1. skytteförb. GM, dess idr:förb. GM samt dess v. landst :förb. SM, SkytteM.
translated: Kugelberg, Erik Gustaf, Major, Linköping, b. 9/3/91 in Malexander, Östergötland, son of Captain Oscar K. and Ellen Hagberg. Married on 16, Gunnel Arre. Children: Ingrid b. 17, Hans b. 19, Lieutenant in I. 4 reserve. Graduated from Norrköping High School in 11, Officer's Exam in 13, Special Sabre Course, Weapons Officer's Course. Second Lieutenant in First Life Grenadier Regiment in 13, promoted to Lieutenant in 17, transferred to Life Grenadier Regiment in 28, Captain in the same year, promoted to Major in 40. Awarded with the Royal Order of the Sword, Swedish Military Sports Federation's Gold Medal, Östergötland's First Rifle Association's Gold Medal, and its Sports Association's Gold Medal as well as the Östergötland's Second Regional Council's Silver Medal, Shooting Medal.

awards.name: Swedish Military Sports Federation's Gold Medal (SvmifbGM)
Östergötland's First Rifle Association's Gold Medal (SvgifrfbGM)
Östergötland's First Rifle Association's Sports Association's Gold Medal (dess idr:förb. GM)
Östergötland's Second Regional Council's Silver Medal (v. landst :förb. SM)
